name: skugo
description: Generate a unique shareable link and remote into a machine via web interface (SSH)

scripts.build-client: cd client && npm install --no-progress && eslint src/* && rm -rf ./bin && webpack --mode production
scripts.build-host: cd host && npm install --no-progress && eslint src/* && rm -rf ./bin && tsc
scripts.package-host: npm run build-host && rm -rf ./bin && pkg --target node10 --output bin/skugo ./host/main.js && cp host/node_modules/node-pty/build/Release/pty.node bin
scripts.build-relay: cd relay && npm install --no-progress && eslint src/* && rm -rf ./bin && tsc
scripts.start-relay: npm run build-relay && cd relay && docker build -t relay . && docker run --rm -p 80:80 relay
scripts.deploy-relay: npm run build-relay && cd relay && openode deploy
scripts.build-all: npm run build-client && npm run build-host && npm run package-host && npm run build-relay
scripts.release-linux-x64: cd bin && tar -cJf skugo-linux-x64.tar.xz skugo pty.node

author: Trevor Sundberg
